virtual-sensor.name: Rooftop_DozerEventLogger_mapped_demuxed_1385
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerEventLoggerMsg) from Rooftop deployment in usable form

address.predicate: select GENERATION_TIME, POSITION, SENSORTYPE, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TIME0, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_ID0, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TYPE0, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_VALUE0 from Rooftop_DozerEventLogger_mapped_1385 where PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_ID0 != -1

source.query: select GENERATION_TIME, POSITION, SENSORTYPE, (GENERATION_TIME - (PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TIME0 * 1000)) as EVENT_TIMESTAMP, HEADER_SEQNR as SEQUENCE_NUMBER, HEADER_ORIGINATORID as NODE_ID, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_ID0 as EVENT_ID, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TYPE0 as EVENT_TYPE, IF(PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TYPE0=0,NULL,PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_VALUE0) as EVENT_VALUE from wrapper
